delta_recoveries_total.help: Total number of delta recoveries performed by operator

delta_recovery_failures.help: The number of times delta recoveries have failed

pod_readiness_duration.help: The time it takes for a pod to enter a ready state

pod_recoveries_total.help: Total number of times operator has recovered a pod when the pod has been down

pod_recovery_failures_total.help: Total number of times operator has failed to recover a pod

pod_replacements_failed.help: Total number of times pods have failed to be recovered by the operator

pod_replacements_total.help: The amount of times operator has replaced a couchbase server pod due to a change in a couchbase cluster resources

reconcile_failures.help: Total failed reconcile operations performed on a specific cluster

reconcile_time_seconds.help: Length of time per reconcile for a specific cluster

reconcile_total.help: Total reconcile operations performed on a specific cluster

server_http_request_codes_total.help: Total HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster, method and status code returned

server_http_request_failures.help: Total failed HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster

server_http_requests_time_milliseconds.help: Length of time per request for a specific cluster

server_http_requests_total.help: Total HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster

swap_rebalance_failures.help: Total number of times swap rebalances have failed

swap_rebalances_total.help: Total number of swap rebalances performed by the operator

upgrade_duration.help: The time taken to perform an upgrade

volume_expansions_total.help: Total number of times the size of volumes have been increased under management
